About the Company: Ucal Fuel Systems Ltd is in the business of providing holistic solutions in fuel management systems and is committed to producing products of consistent quality and timely delivery. This is validated because Ucal is the most preferred supplier of products to customers such as Maruti Udyog, Hyundai, General Motors, Cummins, Bosch, Mikuni, TVS Motor Company, Bajaj Auto, Suzuki, Yamaha & Hero Honda Motors to name a few.The product range of the company includes Gasoline Systems & Products,Gasoline Engines 4 Wheelers,Gasoline Engine 2 Wheelers,Gasoline Engine Pumps,Diesel Systems & Products,EMS System Products,Emission Control & Other Products,High pressure Die cast Products and Precision Machined Products.
